segments.text: I see the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, trying to be quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's doing a good job of being sneaky, but it's also dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her cookie with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, making such a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip on the wet floor and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and inviting, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious just watching the boy balance like that on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt with all this water and the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
